sentences.en: First meetings always involve this tentative kind of exploration.
sentences.cn: 最初几次会晤总是要作一番临时的探讨.

sentences.en: From the "Red Sorghum", Mo Yan almost never stops his exploration and innovation in the aspects of literary style.
sentences.cn: 从《红高粱》开始，莫言几乎从未停止在文体方面的探索和创新。

sentences.en: Humanity has made great progress in space exploration and medicine.
sentences.cn: 人类在太空研究和医学上取得了很大进展.

sentences.en: I looked forward to the exploration of their theories.
sentences.cn: 我期待着研究他们的理论。

sentences.en: My ideas on semantics needed more careful exploration.
sentences.cn: 我关于语义学的一些想法需要更仔细的研究.

sentences.en: oil exploration facilities in the North Sea
Oryx is a Dallas-based oil and gas exploration and production concern.
sentences.cn: 奥瑞克斯是一家设在达拉斯的石油和天然气勘探生产公司。

sentences.en: Professor Field is devoted to the exploration of the frontiers of medicine.
sentences.cn: 菲尔德教授致力于探索医学研究的新领域.

sentences.en: Sextant can be used for exploration and navigation .
sentences.cn: 六分仪可用于航海和勘探中。

sentences.en: The answer to this question is now under exploration.
sentences.cn: 该问题的解决办法在探讨中.

sentences.en: The story of their exploration is inextricably bound up with the character of the caves themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们的勘探经历与这些洞穴本身的特征有着不可分割的紧密联系。

sentences.en: These new discoveries have broken new ground in the exploration of the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 这些新的发现在宇宙探索方面开辟了新道路.

sentences.en: This book is descriptive of a scientific exploration.
sentences.cn: 这本书是描写科学探险的.

sentences.en: This was not by any means a daring expedition into the outback, it was a very unambitious exploration.
sentences.cn: 这绝不是什么冒险深入内地的远征，只是一次平淡无奇的探险而已。

sentences.en: We set out on this voyage of exploration with an open mind.
sentences.cn: 我们以开放的心态开始了这次探索之旅。

sentences.en: You can then use this hut as a base for explorations into the mountains around.
sentences.cn: 你到时可以把这间小屋当大本营，去周围的山里探险。

phrases.tran_cn: 勘探地球物理学；探测地球物理学
地质勘探；地质勘察；地质勘测
太空探索；空间探索；外层空间探索

trans.tran_en: the act of travelling through a place in order to find out about it or find something such as oil or gold in it
